column11: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"cyan","icon":"mdi-bird","max":1,"cooldown":"$14$","activeCost":"${ energy: 50 }$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: 'maxdamageBio', value: 0.2, int: 0.001 }, { type: 'damagePhysic', value: 2.6, str: 0.5 }]$","activeType":"combat"}
column12: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"浅绿色油漆","icon":"mdi-sack","max":1,"cooldown":"$SECONDS_PER_HOUR$","activeCost":"${}$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: '血液', value: 80 }]$","activeType":"utility"}
column13: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"粉红色油漆","icon":"mdi-bottle-tonic","max":5,"cost":20,"cooldown":"$120$","activeCost":"${ mana: 7 }$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: 'buff', value: 30, effect: [{ type: 'mult', name: '攻击', value: lvl  \\cdot  0.25 + 1.75 }, { type: 'base', name: '暴击率', value: 0.4 }, { type: 'base', name: '暴击伤害', value: 1.5 }, { type: 'mult', name: '受到的物理伤害', value: 1 / (lvl  \\cdot  0.25 + 1.75) }, { type: 'mult', name: '受到的魔法伤害', value: 1 / (lvl  \\cdot  0.25 + 1.75) }, { type: 'mult', name: '受到的生物伤害', value: 1 / (lvl  \\cdot  0.25 + 1.75) }, { type: 'base', name: '恢复', value: 0.25 }, { type: 'base', name: '防御', value: 0.02 }] }]$","activeType":"combat"}
column16: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"grey","icon":"mdi-bomb","max":5,"cost":20,"cooldown":"$22$","activeCost":"${ energy: 70 }$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: 'damageMagic', value: lvl + 6.5, int: 0.8 }]$","activeType":"combat"}
column24: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"dark-grey","icon":"mdi-circle-slice-8","max":5,"cost":20,"cooldown":"$35$","activeCost":"${ energy: 120 }$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: 'damagePhysic', value: lvl  \\cdot  1.2 + 7.8, str: 0.9 }, { type: 'stun', value: lvl + 3 }]$","activeType":"combat"}
column25: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"金色油漆","icon":"mdi-bottle-tonic","max":5,"cost":20,"cooldown":"$210 - 30  \\cdot  lvl$","activeCost":"${ mana: 7 - lvl }$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: 'refillEnergy', value: 1 }]$","activeType":"combat"}
column30: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"wooden","icon":"mdi-treasure-chest","max":5,"cost":20,"cooldown":"$HORDE_STACKING_COOLDOWN$","activeCost":"${}$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: 'permanentStat', stat: '血液增益_mult', value: lvl  \\cdot  0.07 + 0.07 }]$","activeType":"utility"}
column32: {"type":"passive","color":"橙色油漆-红色油漆","icon":"mdi-screwdriver","max":1,"cost":100,"effect":[{"name":"撬锁器增益","type":"mult","value":"$lvl  \\cdot  0.25 + 1$"},{"name":"撬锁器容量","type":"base","value":"$lvl  \\cdot  21$"}]}
column35: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"brown","icon":"mdi-ship-wheel","max":5,"cost":20,"cooldown":"$570 - 60  \\cdot  lvl$","activeCost":"${ energy: 250, mana: 30 }$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: 'damagePhysic', value: lvl  \\cdot  3 + 18, str: 1.8 }, { type: 'damageMagic', value: lvl  \\cdot  2 + 14.5, int: 2.35 }, { type: 'buff', value: lvl  \\cdot  5 + 25, effect: [{ type: 'mult', name: '攻击', value: lvl  \\cdot  0.35 + 2.25 }, { type: 'base', name: '切割', value: 0.15 }, { type: 'mult', name: '重生时间', value: 0.01 }] }]$","activeType":"combat"}
